term.title: photoacoustic spectroscopy

item.text: A spectroscopic technique based on the photoacoustic effect. A photoacoustic spectrum consists of a plot of the intensity of the acoustic signal detected by a microphone or a 'piezoelectric' detector, against the excitation wavelength or another quantity related to the photon energy of the modulated excitation.
